text: @TomFitton @tmullgolfs @DisrnNews So sad. It just shows government officials are trying to count any and everything as Covid19 in order to bolster the numbers.  Is someone decided to really look into this I bet the number of actual Covid19 deaths would fall by 20% to 50%.
